page.title: 17CHANGES IN ALVA
page.content: People who have lived in Alva all their lives have noticed lots of changes. The main one is that Alva has grown bigger. The{population}has doubled in the last 10 years. People hope that Alva does not get any bigger because then the{community}spirit would be lost. As Alva has grown there are now better facilities for every- one. There are new primary and secondary{schools,}a sports complex and a community centre converted from the old school. Elderly people have special{sheltered housing,}some of it provided by the{Cochrane Foundation. This is an organisation started by a local family which made money from weaving factories in America in the 1860's.
